name: Pedro (itch) (Juansabee, LuisGPulgar, Flaquero, Lemoncities, mapaxhe, undramaticocualquiera)
name_original: Pedro (itch) (Juansabee, LuisGPulgar, Flaquero, Lemoncities, mapaxhe, undramaticocualquiera)
description:
Once upon a time, in a strange world, the dark demon Rigoberto appeared, wounded and looking for something or someone to posses.

And so, he found the perfect subject... You!

You, Pedro, now must eat to live, without food you'll grow older in just seconds!

How to play

  • You constantly grow older, so you need to eat the pink flies to absorb their youth to keep yourself alive
  • If you touch the yellow enemies, your age is gonna grow fast
  • Use the pink flies to reset your dashes
  • Keep your age the youngest and perform combos 

Controls

  • A - Move Left (Dash left in Air)
  • D - Move Right (Dash right in Air
  • W - Jump (Dash up in Air)
  • A + W - Dash diagonal Left
  • D + W - Dash diagonal Right

Credits

  • Victor
  • Franco Soler
  • Sofia
  • Luis Pulgar
  • Flor Davila
  • Juan Gutierrez
